00044 #ifndef __MD5_LOC_H__
00045 #define __MD5_LOC_H__
00046 
00047 #define HEX_STRING      "0123456789abcdef"      /* to convert to hex */
00048 #define BLOCK_SIZE_MASK (MD5_BLOCK_SIZE - 1)
00049 
00054 #if defined(__alpha) || defined(WIN32) || defined(__i386__)
00055 
00058 #define SWAP(n) (n)
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 #if defined(__sparc) || defined(__powerpc__)
00062 
00065 #define SWAP(n) \
00066     (((n) << 24) | (((n) & 0xff00) << 8) | (((n) >> 8) & 0xff00) | ((n) >> 24))
00067 #endif
00068 
00075 /* #define FF(b, c, d) ((b & c) | (~b & d)) */
00076 #define FF(b, c, d)     (d ^ (b & (c ^ d)))
00077 #define FG(b, c, d)     FF(d, b, c)
00078 #define FH(b, c, d)     (b ^ c ^ d)
00079 #define FI(b, c, d)     (c ^ (b | ~d))
00080 
00086 #define CYCLIC(w, s)    ((w << s) | (w >> (32 - s)))
00087 
00097 #define OP1(a, b, c, d, b_p, c_p, s, T)                         \
00098      do {                                                       \
00099        memcpy(c_p, b_p, sizeof(md5_uint32));                    \
00100        *c_p = SWAP(*c_p);                                       \
00101        a += FF (b, c, d) + *c_p + T;                            \
00102        a = CYCLIC (a, s);                                       \
00103        a += b;                                                  \
00104        b_p = (char *)b_p + sizeof(md5_uint32);                  \
00105        c_p++;                                                   \
00106     } while (0)
00107 
00113 #define OP234(FUNC, a, b, c, d, k, s, T)                \
00114     do {                                                \
00115       a += FUNC (b, c, d) + k + T;                      \
00116       a = CYCLIC (a, s);                                \
00117       a += b;                                           \
00118     } while (0)
00119 
00120 #endif /* ! __MD5_LOC_H__ */
